channel.title: Romeo and Juliet essay thesis statement
channel.description:
Nothing sounds exactly right in my head.
Here's the prompt: "Although Romeo and Juliet's complete title is The Tragedy of Romeo and Juliet, some critics have argued that the play does not meet the criteria of a tragedy, citing particularly the role of chance in determining the characters' destinies. Based on what you know about tragedy as a genre, discuss whether Romeo and Juliet is properly given that designation. Be sure to support your arguments with ample evidence from the play."

item.title: Romeo and Juliet essay thesis statement

use the pythagorean theorem

@Unlimited1 wrote:

Pearls Before Swine – 19 Jun 09

A Free Book Report for Cheating Students Everywhere Who Would Otherwise Be...

I just read “Romeo and Juliet.”   I had not read it since ninth grade.  I had not read it since being taught it by the same English teacher who would somehow turn me off to all literatu…
